PlatinumCapitalGestãoRecursos.name: Platinum Capital Gestão de Recursos
PlatinumCapitalGestãoRecursos.label: Platinum Capital Gestão de Recursos
PlatinumCapitalGestãoRecursos.description:
Located in Manhattan Beach, Platinum Capital Commercial provides real estate loans to businesses and individuals throughout Los Angeles / Southern California region, the state of California and nationwide. Our lending specialists are dedicated to finding the best rate and right loan for you. We pride ourselves on assisting our clients by strategizing their specific needs, no matter how complex. Because we work with over 100 banks and other creative lending sources across the country, we are able to offer low rates and financing solutions for just about any situation. Our extensive array of commercial real estate loan programs include income property loans, multi-family apartment loans, construction and development loans, office building loans, hard money loans, credit tenant financing, capital financing structures, land financing loans, and more. At Platinum Capital Commercial, we service the loans on many mortgages that we originate. We provide quality, personalized service, because we know you, your property, your loan documents, and your lender. This ongoing relationship makes the transition from origination to servicing seamless, and simplifies any modifications to the financing as your needs change.
Link: Platinum Capital Gestão de Recursos

BitfuryGroupLimited.description:
The Bitfury Group is the leading full service Blockchain technology company and one of the largest private infrastructure providers in the Blockchain ecosystem. The Bitfury Group is a global team of experts in technology, business, communications
Link: Bitfury Group Limited

PlatinumCapitalGestãoRecursos.name: Platinum Capital Gestão de Recursos
PlatinumCapitalGestãoRecursos.label: Platinum Capital Gestão de Recursos
PlatinumCapitalGestãoRecursos.description:
Located in Manhattan Beach, Platinum Capital Commercial provides real estate loans to businesses and individuals throughout Los Angeles / Southern California region, the state of California and nationwide. Our lending specialists are dedicated to finding the best rate and right loan for you. We pride ourselves on assisting our clients by strategizing their specific needs, no matter how complex. Because we work with over 100 banks and other creative lending sources across the country, we are able to offer low rates and financing solutions for just about any situation. Our extensive array of commercial real estate loan programs include income property loans, multi-family apartment loans, construction and development loans, office building loans, hard money loans, credit tenant financing, capital financing structures, land financing loans, and more. At Platinum Capital Commercial, we service the loans on many mortgages that we originate. We provide quality, personalized service, because we know you, your property, your loan documents, and your lender. This ongoing relationship makes the transition from origination to servicing seamless, and simplifies any modifications to the financing as your needs change.
Link: Platinum Capital Gestão de Recursos
